amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to Northern Rockies headwaters extreme weather mitigation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 847 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 847 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
